#!/bin/bash
echo "bienvenu au menu voici vos options:"
echo "-Date du jour(Date)"
echo "-liste de persones coo sur la machine(lc)"
echo "-liste de fichier du rÃ©pÃ©rtoire courant(ls)"
echo "-Nom du repertoire courant(Nom)"
case $1 in
Date ) echo `date`
lc   ) echo `watch lsof -i`
ls   ) echo `ls`
Nom  ) echo `pwd`
esac

do

done

done

#!/bin/bash

echo "bienvenu au menu voici vos options:"

echo "-Date du jour(Date)"

echo "-liste de persones coo sur la machine(lc)"

echo "-liste de fichier du rÃ©pÃ©rtoire courant(ls)"

echo "-Nom du repertoire courant(Nom)"

read a

case $a in

Date ) echo `date`;;

lc   ) echo `ls -i`;;

ls   ) echo `ls`;;

Nom  ) echo `pwd`;;

esac
#!/bin/bash

echo "bienvenu au menu voici vos options:"
echo "-Date du jour(Date)"
echo "-liste de persones coo sur la machine(lc)"
echo "-liste de fichier du rÃ©pÃ©rtoire courant(ls)"
echo "-Nom du repertoire courant(Nom)"

while test "$a" -eq "1" -o "$a" -eq "2" -o "$a" -eq "3" -o "$a" -es "4"
do
read a
case $a in
Date ) echo `date`;;
lc   ) echo `ls -i`;;
ls   ) echo `ls`;;
Nom  ) echo `pwd`;;
esac
done

#!/bin/sh
fct(){
 var2="variable 2"
 echo "\nDans fonction"
 echo "\$1 = $1"
 echo "var1 = $var1"
 echo "var2 = $var2"
 echo "fin fonction\n"
}

var1="variable 1"
echo "dans script principal"
echo "\$1 = $1"
echo "var1 = $var1"
fct $var1
echo "var2 = $var2"
echo "fin script principal"
#!/bin/bash
calcul (){
if [ $2 = "*" ]
then
	return expr($1 * $3)
else if [ $2 = "/" ]
then
	return expr($1/$3)
else if [ $2 = "+" ]
then
	return expr($1 + $2)
else if [ $2 = "-" ]
then
	return expr ($1 - $2)
else
return "operand invalide"

}
